fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step2.adapter

Class AdapterRequestDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller.ResourceInspector
        • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step2.adapter.AdapterRequestDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, DataPushDispatcherReceiverI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdapterRequestDispatcherCoordinable, AutonomicController

    public class AdapterRequestDispatcher
extends ResourceInspector
implements DataPushDispatcherReceiverI
    Version:
    02.01.2018 This class AdapterComponent represents the Adapter of the current behavior of Application VM and allocated cores, we can do adaption as Changing the frequency of one or many cores adding or removing a core, adding an AVM or removing one. The rolling-average is preferably an average of four consecutive required average amounts pushed by the adaptable entity RequestDispatcherComponent
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
